titleStmt.title: Æsopicks: or, A second collection of fables, paraphras'd in verse, adorn'd with sculpture, and illustrated with annotations. / By John Ogilby, esq; his Majesty's cosmographer, geographick printer, and master of revels in the kingdom of Ireland.
Aesop's fables
titleStmt.author: Aesop.
Ogilby, John, 1600-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Basset, R. Clavel, and R. Chiswel ...,

notesStmt.note: "Annotation on the second volume of Æsop's fables" has separate pagination at end.
